jobActions.name: Blizzard
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 180.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice or removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Fire
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 180.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire or removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: 40% chance to grant Firestarter
Firestarter Effect: Next Fire III will cost no MP and have no cast time
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Transpose
jobActions.description: Swaps Astral Fire with a single Umbral Ice, or Umbral Ice with a single Astral Fire.

jobActions.name: Thunder
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 45
Duration: 24s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Blizzard II
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 80 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Scathe
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: 20% chance potency will double

jobActions.name: Fire II
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 80 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Thunder II
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 60 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 30
Duration: 18s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Manaward
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier that nullifies damage totaling up to 30% of maximum HP.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Manafont
jobActions.description:
Fully restores MP.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Thunderhead
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Additional Effect: Grants Paradox
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Fire III
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 280.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Blizzard III
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 280.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Umbral Soul
jobActions.description:
Grants Umbral Ice and 1 Umbral Heart.
Additional Effect: Halts the expiration of Umbral Ice
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Additional Effect: Restores an amount of MP commensurate with your stacks of Umbral Ice
Umbral Ice I: 2,500 MP
Umbral Ice II: 5,000 MP
Umbral Ice III: 10,000 MP
Grants Umbral Ice III and 3 Umbral Hearts, and also restores 10,000 MP when used while outside of combat.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Freeze
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Thunder III
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 120.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 50
Duration: 27s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Aetherial Manipulation
jobActions.description:
Rush to a target party member's side.
Unable to cast if bound.

jobActions.name: Flare
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 240 for the first enemy, and 30% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants 3 stacks of Astral Soul
Effect ends when Astral Fire expires.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Ley Lines
jobActions.description:
Connects naturally occurring ley lines to create a circle of power which, while standing within it, reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Blizzard IV
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Fire IV
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Soul
Effect ends when Astral Fire expires.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Between the Lines
jobActions.description:
Move instantly to Ley Lines drawn by you.
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Thunder IV
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 80 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 35
Duration: 21s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Triplecast
jobActions.description:
The next three spells will require no cast time.
Duration: 15s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Foul
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Polyglot Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Despair
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 350.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Xenoglossy
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 880.
Polyglot Cost: 1

jobActions.name: High Fire II
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: High Blizzard II
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Amplifier
jobActions.description:
Grants Polyglot.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Paradox
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 500.
Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Astral Fire
Duration: 15s
Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Firestarter
Firestarter Effect: Next Fire III will require no time to cast and cost no MP
Duration: 30s
Umbral Ice Bonus: Requires no MP to cast and grants Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Paradox.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Fire and Blizzard change to Paradox when requirements for execution are met.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: High Thunder
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 60
Duration: 30s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name: High Thunder II
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 40
Duration: 24s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Thunderhead, granted when gaining Astral Fire or Umbral Ice from an unaspected state, or changing between their influences.
Thunderhead Duration: 30s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name:
Retrace
Prerequisite Quest
jobActions.description:
Weave ley lines anew, setting your circle of power at a new location.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Ley Lines, and the effect duration will not be reset.

jobActions.name: Flare Star
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 400 for the first enemy, and 65% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed when the Astral Gauge is full.

roleActions.name: Addle
roleActions.description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Sleep
roleActions.description:
Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

traits.name: Aspect Mastery
traits.description:
Casting of certain fire and ice spells will grant a stack of Astral Fire and Umbral Ice respectively.
Maximum Stacks: 1
Duration: 15s
While under the effect of Astral Fire, the potency of Fire spells is increased by 40%, the cost of casting Fire spells is doubled, MP recovery is reduced to 0, and the potency of Ice spells is reduced by 10%.
While under the effect of Umbral Ice, the cost of casting Ice spells is reduced to 0, 2,500 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell, and the potency of Fire spells is reduced by 10%.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Aspect Mastery II
traits.description:
Allows the stacking of a second Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.
While under the effect of Astral Fire, the potency of Fire spells is increased by 60% and the potency of Ice spells is reduced by 20%.
While under the effect of Umbral Ice, 5,000 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell and the potency of Fire spells is reduced by 20%.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Aspect Mastery III
traits.description:
Allows the stacking of a third Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.
Casting Fire II or Blizzard II grants maximum stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice respectively.
While under the effect of Astral Fire III, the potency of Fire spells is increased by 80%, and the cast time of Ice spells is halved and potency lowered by 30%.
While under the effect of Umbral Ice III, 10,000 MP is recovered upon landing an Ice spell, and the cast time of Fire spells is halved and potency lowered by 30%.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Firestarter
traits.description:
Grants a 40% chance that after casting Fire, your next Fire III will require no MP and have no cast time.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Thunder Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Thunder to Thunder III.

traits.name: Enochian
traits.description:
Increases damage dealt by 5% while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Umbral Heart
traits.description:
Grants an Umbral Heart upon casting Freeze, or executing Manafont or Umbral Soul.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Thunder Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Thunder II to Thunder IV.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian
traits.description: Grants the effect of Polyglot upon maintaining Enochian for 30 seconds. Also improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 10%.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian II
traits.description: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 15%.

traits.name: Enhanced Polyglot
traits.description: Allows the stacking of a second Polyglot.

traits.name: Enhanced Foul
traits.description: Allows for the immediate casting of Foul.

traits.name: Aspect Mastery IV
traits.description: Upgrades Fire II and Blizzard II to High Fire II and High Blizzard II.

traits.name: Enhanced Manafont
traits.description:
Reduces Manafont recast time to 100 seconds.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian III
traits.description:
Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 25%.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Aspect Mastery V
traits.description:
Adds a Paradox marker to your Elemental Gauge.
The marker is made active after reaching Astral Fire III then swapping to the opposite element. Conversely, the marker can also be made active after reaching Umbral Ice III and gaining 3 Umbral Hearts then swapping to the opposite element. The marker is made inactive when the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice expires.
Fire and Blizzard become Paradox when the Paradox marker is made active.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Thunder Mastery III
traits.description: Upgrades Thunder III to High Thunder and Thunder IV to High Thunder II.

traits.name: Enhanced Ley Lines
traits.description: The location of Ley Lines can be reset while its effect is active.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian IV
traits.description: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 33%.

traits.name: Enhanced Polyglot II
traits.description: Allows the stacking of a third Polyglot.

traits.name: Enhanced Astral Fire
traits.description:
Grants a stack of Astral Soul upon landing Fire IV or Flare.
Maximum Stacks: 6
